title: Ancient Megaliths discovered from Thanamalvila
content: 15 Megalith monuments were discovered in the Kithulkote area in Thanamalwila. These ancient monuments were found after a school student made the discovery and informed the schoolâ€™s history teacher.The Department of Archaeology said the Megalith Monuments date back to the Iron Age and a discovery of a cluster of megaliths is rare. Accordingly, the 15 Megalith Burial Monuments at Kithulkotte, Thanamalwila will be very important to those who study the Prehistoric Age in the country, he said.
